          <title>
            <string language="en">Strong and weak solutions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Starke und schwache Lösungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Solutions fortes et faibles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Soluções fortes e fracas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soluzioni forti e deboli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ισχυρές και αδύνατες λύσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Soluciones fuertes y débiles</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These diagrams compare the amount of sugar between a weak sugar solution and a strong one.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reactions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">strong solutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sugar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weak solutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Diagramme vergleichen die Menge des Zuckers 
zwischen einer schwachen Zuckerlösung und einem starken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces diagrammes comparent la quantité de sucre 
entre une solution faible de sucre et forte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas comparam a quantidade de açúcar 
entre uma solução fraca do açúcar e forte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi confrontano la quantità di zucchero
fra una soluzione debole dello zucchero e forte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα συγκρίνουν το ποσό ζάχαρης 
μεταξύ μιας αδύνατης λύσης ζάχαρης και μιας ισχυρής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos diagramas comparan la cantidad de azúcar 
entre una solución débil del azúcar y fuerte.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Reaktionen</string>
